AzureAd.TenantId: Enter the Id of your Azure AD tenant copied from the Azure portal
AzureAd.Domain: Enter the domain of your Azure AD tenant, e.g. 'contoso.onmicrosoft.com'
AzureAd.ClientId: Enter the application ID (clientId) of the 'TodoListAPI' application copied from the Azure portal

Groups.GroupAdmin: Enter the objectID for GroupAdmin group copied from Azure Portal
Groups.GroupMember: Enter the objectID for GroupMember group copied from Azure Portal
